channel.title: Starting a new server
channel.description:
I'm tired of looking for a good source that isn't DSPK so fuck it, I'm going to make a unique dspk.. But there is a few things I need to know:
[b][i]Questions[/i][/b] [i]How many players could I hold with a 20$ vps from vpsland using a normal dspk?[/i] [i]Any suggestions for a good source?[/i] [i]What vps should I use? Thinking of vpsland but is there any better?[/i] [i]Do you think I should use dspk? If so why? If not why?[/i]
Imo, I don't see anything wrong with DSPK.. I really don't understand the problem. Even though everyone has it, It's the best thing out so.. why not?
Any of you have any tips for me? I'm not one of those faggots that wants to start a server to be cool, I've been bored lately and I'm hoping to make a good, successful server. Also, please don't post telling me "Ooh you gotta change your compiler to your java version" and tell me how to portforward and shit, I'm not dumb.
Lastly, Are any of these good for a starter source: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,495448.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,509843.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,498964.0.html
Thanks to anyone who replies, It really means a lot.

item.title: Starting a new server
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“Anc13ntsIsBack, post:2, topic:409259”][quote]Questions
How many players could I hold with a 20$ vps from vpsland using a normal dspk?
Any suggestions for a good source?
What vps should I use? Thinking of vpsland but is there any better?
Do you think I should use dspk? If so why? If not why?[/quote]

  1. I would not suggest vpsland they do not have good support what so ever. Anyone with a booter with < 100 shells can easily hit you offline. If you’re going to go for a long time server. Staminus.net
  2. Use whatever.
  3. DSPK is not bad, it just has quite a lot of bugs you’ll need to find out how to fix.
  4. Vpsland once again, is horrible. (I’m out of order, but oh well.)[/quote]

Thanks, I realize DSPK is good and bad but I like oldschool a lot better, but everything is DSPK now so it would be hard to get players on an oldschool server…

Read full topic

item.title: Starting a new server

@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

Questions How many players could I hold with a 20$ vps from vpsland using a normal dspk? Any suggestions for a good source? What vps should I use? Thinking of vpsland but is there any better? Do you think I should use dspk? If so why? If not why?
  1. I would not suggest vpsland they do not have good support what so ever. Anyone with a booter with < 100 shells can easily hit you offline. If you’re going to go for a long time server. Staminus.net
  2. Use whatever.
  3. DSPK is not bad, it just has quite a lot of bugs you’ll need to find out how to fix.
  4. Vpsland once again, is horrible. (I’m out of order, but oh well.)

item.title: Starting a new server
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

I’m tired of looking for a good source that isn’t DSPK so fuck it, I’m going to make a unique dspk… But there is a few things I need to know:

Questions
How many players could I hold with a 20$ vps from vpsland using a normal dspk?
Any suggestions for a good source?
What vps should I use? Thinking of vpsland but is there any better?
Do you think I should use dspk? If so why? If not why?

Imo, I don’t see anything wrong with DSPK… I really don’t understand the problem. Even though everyone has it, It’s the best thing out so… why not?

Any of you have any tips for me? I’m not one of those faggots that wants to start a server to be cool, I’ve been bored lately and I’m hoping to make a good, successful server. Also, please don’t post telling me “Ooh you gotta change your compiler to your java version” and tell me how to portforward and shit, I’m not dumb.

Lastly, Are any of these good for a starter source:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Thanks to anyone who replies, It really means a lot.
